backend/main.mo: Canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and lead management with admin‑only lead retrieval and deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping requested features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend pages, components, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app and mounting it to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and defines routes for all main site pages using SiteLayout as the root.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile‑only bottom CTA bar with links to booking and WhatsApp using MARKETING_CONFIG.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing branding, navigation links, contact info, social links, and hours sourced from MARKETING_CONFIG.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with branding and navigation, including a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and a mobile CTA bar.
frontend/src/components/sections/LeadFor: Form component for collecting lead info and submitting via useSubmitLead, with success UI and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Limited: Promotional banner advertising a limited-time 50% discount with a call‑to‑action link.
frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbe: Embeds a Google Maps iframe using marketing config values inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanCom: Displays gym plan features in a table with desktop and mobile layouts, using icons for availability.
frontend/src/components/sections/Trainer: Shows a grid of coach highlight cards sourced from the COACHES config.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates page title and meta description and injects structured JSON‑LD data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/social/Testimoni: Carousel showcasing testimonial cards with ratings and user details.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Contains branding constants including logo path and company name.
frontend/src/config/coaches.ts: Defines the Coach interface and exports a list of coach profiles.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Holds marketing details like contact info, maps embed URL, location, and working hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a hook that fetches all leads via the backend actor using React Query, enabled once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit a new lead through the actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, dark mode settings, typography, and gold-themed utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata and content describing the gym's mission, vision, and benefits.
frontend/src/pages/CafePage.tsx: Displays the Fitness Café page with SEO data and sections describing nutrition concepts and menu categories.
Shows the contact and trial booking page with a lead form, contact info cards, map embed, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, services, and promotional sections using marketing config and various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Displays membership plan tiers with pricing, features, and calls to action, including a popular highlighted plan.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Shows an overview of available fitness programs with descriptions, feature lists, and links to contact.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with fallback to sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature requirements, known issues, and current state related to gym website updates.
